name: stickmaniac (alpha)
description:
Pew pew!

Stickmaniac is a small game where you shoot things and they go boom boom. Play by yourself and murder enemies, or play multiplayer... and murder your friends.

Multiplayer only works with controllers, and supports one to four players (but if you're playing a multiplayer game by yourself, you should really go get a life.)

Controls (single player only):

WASD/arrow keys: move

Space: shoot

Escape: pause game

Controller

Left Stick: move

A: shoot (or B on Nintendo devices)

Start: pause game

version 0.1.0 (ugly GUI will be fixed later)

open source
